protocol.text: Plants were frozen in LN immediately after harvesting and ground into a fine powder.
Plants were grown under long-day (LD) or short-day (SD) conditions (16h light/8h dark or 8h light/16h dark, respectively) at 22/19Â°C, 70% humidity.
RNA was extracted using RNeasy plant kit (Qiagen) and 150ng of total RNA were used to further analysis.
Nucleic acids were labeled by biotin-labeling with the IVT labeling kit (GeneChip 3'IVT Express; Affymetrix)
The labeled nucleic acids were hybridised to array for 16h as recommended by the supplier (Gene expression analysis manual; Affymetrix).
protocol.type: nucleic acid hybridization to array protocol

protocol.text: The data normalisation (RMA- summarisation method) was done using GeneSpring GX software according to guided workflow.
